num_tested_probands: We present three novel mutations in the butyrylcholinesterase gene (BCHE) identified in three families.
DNA samples were collected from two of the probands and four relatives.
num_positive_het_probands: one was heterozygous for the atypical and a silent variant (AS).

indicated that two of the patients were homozygous for a silent variant and one was heterozygous for the atypical and a silent variant (AS).
